description.en: High school student Kusakabe Makoto has to work all day to raise money for the treatment of his younger sister, who suffers from a serious illness. The father is unemployed, the mother ran away, leaving the children, bullying at work … Despite all this, he does not lose hope and continues to live for her sister. But having learned that she did not have long, Makoto falls into despair. Fear of the unknown causes him to take a different look at the value of human life.
description.ru: Старшекласснику Кусакабэ Макото приходится работать дни напролёт, чтобы собрать деньги на лечение младшей сестры, страдающей от тяжёлой болезни. Отец безработный, мать сбежала, бросив детей, издевательства на работе… Несмотря на всё это, он не теряет надежды и продолжает жить ради сестры. Но узнав, что ей осталось недолго, Макото впадает в отчаяние. Страх перед неизвестностью заставляет его по-другому взглянуть на ценность человеческой жизни.

description.en: Kuruma Suuna, a gloomy and socially awkward girl, begins her high school dorm life only to discover her new roommate, Hamanasu Ruka, flirting with another girl!

title.en: The Crown of Rutile Quartz -Slaine, The King, and the Heroic Tale-

altTitles.ja: ルチルクォーツの戴冠 -王の誕生-

description.en:
The Crown of Rutile Quartz -Slaine, The King, and the Heroic Tale-
Slaine is a humble, provincial commoner in the small Kingdom of Hasenvalia… Or so he thinks until the day the entire royal family is wiped out in a palace fire and Slaine comes to learn he’s really the king’s illegitimate son. It now falls on him to succeed the throne. Despite his lack of knowledge and experience, Slaine’s natural wits and dedication—plus the support of his aide-de-camp, Monica—allow him to excel against all odds. Between unsupportive nobles at home and hostile rulers abroad, Slaine already has his work cut out for him—and then, on the eve of his coronation, the great Empire of Galed declares war against Hasenvalia. Faced with such a frighteningly powerful foe, Slaine is forced to make a choice between fleeing into political exile or resisting invasion to the bitter end. Caught between the conflicting agendas of neighboring nations, this boy from a backwater town must learn how to grow into his crown. Witness the birth of a king!
The start of the full-fledged fantasy  manga drawn by the up-and-coming manga artist, Tai!

Rex is a half man half dog. He was created when a drunk old man forced himself on a stray female dog in the street. 
Because of his father, Rex has to live his life as a freak rejected by society.
So one day he’s gonna find that man, and RAPE him.

description.ru: Рекс - наполовину человек, наполовину собака. Он был создан, когда пьяный старик изнасиловал собаку на улице. Из-за отца Рекс вынужден жить как урод, отвергнутый обществом. Так что однажды... он найдет этого человека и отомстит ему.
description.uk: Рекс - напівлюдина напівсобака. Він був створений коли дуже п'яне чмо трахнуло вуличну собаку. Через нього він став потворою та ізгоєм. Тож одного дня... він знайде свого "татуся", і зґвалтує ЙОГО!
description.es-la: Rex es un híbrido mitad hombre, mitad perro. Fue creado cuando un viejo borracho abusó sexualmente de una perra callejera en la calle. Por culpa de su padre, Rex tiene que vivir su vida como un fenómeno, rechazado por la sociedad. Así que un día… encontrará a ese tipo y lo v*olará.

description.en: The manga will focus on the character Koharu Hidaka, who is a middle school teacher close to 30 years old in 2007.
description.es-la: Año 2007, Hidaka Koharu ahora es maestra de secundaria y a punto de alcanzar los 30 años. Sin novio y sin perspectivas para el futuro. Balanceándose entre el trabajo y la búsqueda de matrimonio, el corazón de esta chica madura es como un Kikouken.

altTitles.ja: 物語の黒幕に転生して

altTitles.ja-ro: Monogatari no Kuromaku ni Tensei shite: Shinka Suru Maken to Game Chishiki de Subete o Nejifuseru

altTitles.en: Reincarnated as the Mastermind Behind the Story
Reincarnated as the Mastermind Behind the Story: Overwhelm Everything With the Ever-Evolving Demon Sword and Game Knowledge

description.en:
There was a globally popular game called *The Legend of the Seven Heroes*. Ren cleared the sequel of that game at the fastest record in the world, and thus he obtained a bonus special data. However, no matter where he looked inside the game, he could not find the data. The moment where Ren was about to give up the search, he decided to start playing the second round of the game.

Suddenly, a notification message “Do you want to start a special story?" appeared on the screen.

When Ren chose “Yes” without hesitation, he lost consciousness, and when he woke up, he was a baby. —Could it be that he was reincarnated as one of the heroes in *The Legend of the Seven Heroes*? Ren, who thought such a thing was impossible, could not believe his ears when he heard his name from his mother's mouth. It was the name of a classmate who betrays the heroes in the middle of the story.

Of course, he wishes to live in peace. But he meets a saint whose life he's supposed to take, and doesn't. Furthermore, he ends up saving a character (the boss of a great noble family) who was supposed to die. All of these things creates a development that he doesn't know about coming to play…

---
**Original Web Novel:** [Kakuyomu](https://kakuyomu.jp/works/16816700427572694145),  [Syosetu](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n1862hs/)
description.pt-br:
Havia um jogo globalmente popular chamado “The Legend of the Seven Heroes”.
Ren finalizou a sequência desse jogo com o recorde mais rápido do mundo e, assim, obteve um bônus especial de dados.
No entanto, não importa onde ele olhou dentro do jogo, ele não conseguiu encontrar os dados.
No momento em que Ren estava prestes a desistir da busca, ele decidiu começar a jogar a segunda rodada do jogo.
De repente, uma mensagem de notificação “Deseja iniciar uma história especial?” aparece na tela.
Quando Ren escolhe “Sim” sem hesitar, ele perde a consciência e, quando acorda, era um bebê. —-
Será que ele reencarnou como um dos heróis em “The Legend of the Seven Heroes”?
Ren, que pensava que tal coisa era impossível, não podia acreditar em seus ouvidos quando ouviu seu nome da boca de sua mãe.
Era o nome de um colega de classe que trai os heróis no meio da história.
Claro, ele deseja viver em paz.
Mas no jogo, ele conhece uma santa cuja vida ele deveria tirar, e não o faz.
Além disso, ele acaba salvando um personagem (o chefe de uma grande família nobre) que deveria morrer.
Todas essas coisas criam um desenvolvimento que ele não sabe jogar…

---
**Original Web Novel:** [Kakuyomu](https://kakuyomu.jp/works/16816700427572694145),  [Syosetu](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n1862hs/)

description.en:
She must avoid dying in her second chance at life?!
A choose-wisely romantic comedy! ☆

On the day of her high school graduation, Ichinose Himari was shoved off to her death by her boyfriend, Taniguchi Shion... At least, that's what she thought, but when she woke up, she had gone back to when she was a second year student! To avoid dying by Shion's hands again, Himari thinks of a solution - - and that solution is to completely show Shion how she feels about him!

Himari's series of unfortunate events begins!

description.en: On a rainy night, Akira Akamori, a high school student about to transfer to a new school, saw his blonde classmate, Aoi Soutome, standing in the park drenched from the rain. “…I don’t have a home anymore.” Though Aoi was a complete stranger to him, Akira couldn’t leave a girl alone, so he took her home. “Thanks for the help.” “I-It’s fine…” When Akira heard about Aoi’s complicated situation, he decided to help her and let her live with him until he transferred to a new school. While confused by their new cohabitation arrangement, the two slowly grew close to each other. It is a love story of two people who repeatedly come together and drift apart, like a spinning record.
description.ja:
来年転校を控えている高校生の明護晃はある雨の日、近所の公園でずぶ濡れになっている金髪ギャルのクラスメイト、五月女葵を見かける。

「……私、帰る家がないの」

どう見てもワケアリの葵を放っておけず、自宅に連れ帰るのだが――

「お風呂、ありがとう」
「お、おう……」

葵の抱える複雑な事情を聞いた晃は人助けだと思い、転校までの間、そのまま一緒に生活をすることに。はじめて尽くしの同居生活に戸惑いながらも、二人はゆっくりと心の距離を近づけていき――。これは、出会いと別れを繰り返す二人の恋物語（ラブストーリー）。
description.pt-br: Uma vez ele ajudou uma garota da sua sala. Em uma tarde chuvosa, Akira Akamori, um colegial que acabou de mudar para uma nova escola, viu sua colega de sala loira, encharcada pela chuva em uma praça por perto. “… eu não tenho mais aonde morar.” Apesar da Aoi ser uma completa estranha para ele, ele não pode deixar a garota sozinha, então a levou para sua casa. “Obrigada pela ajuda.” “E-está tudo bem…”

description.ru: Сакура Хибики - обычная старшеклассница, любящая покушать. Однажды ее подруга замечает, что Хибики поднабрала вес. Огорченная сим фактом, девушка пытается похудеть самостоятельно, но безуспешно. Решив раскошелиться ради великой цели, она направляется в спортзал, где встречает Мисс совершенство, по совместительству президента студсовета своей школы, Сорюин Акэми (у которой, как оказалось, есть небольшая странность). Теперь им вместе предстоит заниматься совершенствованием своих тел под надзором красавчика-тренера Матио.

description.en:
**In this isekai tale, a male scientist from Earth is reborn as an orphan girl in a world of swords and sorcery.**

Ren is a young girl in a primitive world of magic and brutality. Sold as a slave and about to be delivered to an unscrupulous merchant, she suddenly awakens to vivid memories of a past life: a world called Earth, where Ren was both a grown man and a research scientist. Now, she must learn to survive, combining her knowledge of science from her past life with her talent in magic from this life.
description.ja:
「私、おっさんだった！！」

孤児の少女・レンは身売りされる途中で、前世の記憶を取り戻す。レンの前世は、三十代の男性研究者だったが、転生して今まで孤児として生きていたのであった。レンは、その身に秘められた魔法の才能と、前世の科学的知識を駆使して、ひとり過酷な異世界を生き抜いていく。

description.en:
In a certain place, there are two neighboring high schools. Chidori High School, a bottom-feeder boys' school where idiots gather, and Kikyo Girls' School, a well-established girls' school. Rintaro Tsumugi, a strong and quiet second year student at Chidori High School, meets Kaoruko Waguri, a girl who comes as a customer while helping out at his family's cake shop. Rintaro feels comfortable spending time with Kaoruko, but she is a student at Kikyo Girls, a neighboring school that thoroughly dislikes Chidori High. This is the story of two people who are so close and yet so far apart.
___

description.fr:
Bien qu'ils soient mitoyens, le lycée public Chidori pour garçons et le prestigieux lycée privé pour filles Kikyō continuent à entretenir leur tradition de se haïr mutuellement au plus haut point. Tsumugi Rintarō pensait la même chose, jusqu'à ce qu'il fasse la rencontre de Wakuri Kaoruko, élève de Chidori et habituée de la pâtisserie tenue par ses parents. Malgré la désapprobation et les préjugés de leurs camarades respectifs, Rintarō et Kaoruko vont petit à petit se rapprocher, et tant pis ce qu'en pensent les autres !

___

とある場所に、隣接するふたつの高校がある。バカが集まる底辺男子校・千鳥高校と、由緒正しきお嬢様校・桔梗女子。そこに通う紬 凛太郎と、和栗薫子が出会い…。
“近くて遠い”二人が織りなす、鮮やかな青春彩る学園物語!!

とある場所に、隣接するふたつの高校がある。バカが集まる底辺男子校・千鳥高校と、由緒正しきお嬢様校・桔梗女子。強面で物静かな千鳥高校2年・紬 凛太郎は、実家のケーキ屋の手伝い中にお客として来ていた少女・和栗薫子と出会う。薫子との時間を心地よく感じる凛太郎だったが、彼女は徹底して千鳥を嫌う桔梗女子の生徒で……!?

___

description.es-la:
En cierto lugar, hay dos escuelas secundarias vecinas. El instituto Chidori, una escuela masculina de mala muerte en la que se reúnen los idiotas, y el instituto femenino Kikyo, una escuela femenina bien establecida. Rintaro Tsumugi, un fuerte y tranquilo estudiante de segundo curso del instituto Chidori, conoce a Kaoruko Wakuri, una chica que llega como cliente mientras ayuda en la pastelería de su familia. Rintaro se siente cómodo pasando tiempo con Kaoruko, pero ella es alumna de las chicas de Kikyo, una escuela vecina a la que no le gusta nada el instituto Chidori. Esta es la historia de dos personas que están tan cerca y a la vez tan lejos.
___
- [Twitter Oficial (JA)](https://twitter.com/kaoruhana_mp)
description.pt-br: Em um lugar específico, existem duas escolas secundárias vizinhas. A Escola Secundária Chidori, uma escola para rapazes considerada de nível inferior, onde se reúnem estudantes menos dedicados, e a Escola para Meninas Kikyo, uma instituição bem estabelecida. Rintaro Tsumugi, um estudante do segundo ano forte e tranquilo da Escola Secundária Chidori, conhece Kaoruko Waguri, uma garota que aparece como cliente enquanto ajuda na confeitaria da sua família. Rintaro se sente à vontade passando tempo com Kaoruko, mas ela é uma aluna da Escola para Meninas Kikyo, uma escola vizinha que tem aversão à Escola Secundária Chidori. Esta é a história de duas pessoas que estão tão próximas e, ao mesmo tempo, tão distantes.

description.en:
“Until the day humanity falls.”

In the year 2020, Earth’s magnetic poles disappeared and humankind was nearly wiped out by cosmic radiation. Within the span of a hundred years, living creatures began to mutate and devour each other while the remaining humans, numbering in the tens of thousands, struggled bitterly in their man-made bases.

In the Abyss, home to the mutated xenogenics, there lived a sentient little mushroom. Because it had been nourished by the blood and flesh of the deceased human An Ze, not only did it take on a similar-looking human form, but a similar name as well: An Zhe.

An Zhe is determined to go to the human base to search for his spore, which had been harvested by humans. Once there, however, he faces the omnipresent risk of discovery and certain death as he tries to keep his non-human nature hidden from the Judges, whose responsibility is to inspect for and eliminate xenogenics like himself. And of all the Judges, Colonel Lu Feng is the most perceptive and merciless—as soon as he determines that someone is a xenogenic, he will execute that person on the spot.

But An Zhe’s mutation goes undetected by Lu Feng’s eyes, and so a tale of humans and xenogenics unfolds…

Silver Award winner at the 12th Chinese Nebula Awards for Chinese Science Fiction.
description.pl:
Ponury i niegościnny świat po katastrofie ekologicznej. Spustoszoną ziemię bombarduje promieniowanie kosmiczne. Niedobitki ludzkości schroniły się w dwóch ostatnich ocalałych bazach, desperacko próbując przetrwać. Każdy kontakt z obcym organizmem żywym grozi skażeniem genetycznym.

Do bazy ludzi trafia zagubiony chłopak, który w rzeczywistości nie jest nawet człowiekiem. Los styka go z bezlitosnym sędzią, wyszkolonym do tropienia i likwidowania mutantów. Niespodziewanie ich znajomość przeradza się w coś więcej…

Polskie tłumaczenie powieści dostępne tutaj: https://www.wattpad.com/story/251281478-little-mushroom

description.en: Jake, a seemingly average office worker, unexpectedly finds himself thrust into a fantasy world teeming with dangers and opportunities. Rather than succumbing to fear, Jake thrives in this unfamiliar realm. As he navigates the expansive multiverse, his power grows and he transforms—evolving from a mundane office worker into a true apex hunter.

title.en: Rebirth of the Urban Immortal Cultivator

description.en: Chen Fan died in the midst of divine tribulation, having reached the pinnacle of the cultivation world in less than 500 years. Somehow, despite the loss of his cultivation base, he was able to return to his youth as a high school student living on Earth. He decided to once again tread the path to immortality, armed with the knowledge he had gathered in his past life, to overwrite his past mistakes, remove his lingering regrets, and set a firm spiritual foundation that will guarantee success in his inevitable attempt to once again ascend to another plane of existence.
description.pt: Chen Fan morreu no meio da tribulação divina, tendo atingido o ápice do mundo do cultivo em menos de 500 anos. De alguma forma, apesar da perda de sua base de cultivo, ele foi capaz de retornar à sua juventude como um estudante universitário que vivia na Terra. Ele decidiu mais uma vez trilhar o caminho para a imortalidade, armado com o conhecimento que reuniu em sua vida passada, para substituir seus erros do passado, remover seus arrependimentos prolongados e estabelecer uma firme base espiritual que garantirá sucesso em sua inevitável tentativa de uma vez. novamente suba para outro plano de existência.

description.vi:
Mamiya Arika, nữ hát chính của nhóm nhạc thần tượng "Lyrical Trick" bỗng mất tích một cách bí ẩn. Và đầu mối duy nhất về dấu vết của cô chỉ đơn giản là một đoạn video camera an ninh.
Liệu đây có đơn giản chỉ là hành vi của một fan hâm mộ quá khích, một idol otaku hay không...!?

description.en:
The ninth story arc of Jojo’s Bizarre Adventure. 

O’ahu, present day. Dua Lipa is the trending musician, and COVID is still a major concern. On this island lives a 15-year-old boy named Jodio Joestar. Living with his brother and mother, he acts as a dealer for certain illegal substances. One day, his employer comes and shows him an excellent find: a Japanese person has landed in Hawaii with a diamond worth over six million dollars. Normally it would be impossible to steal, but for someone with a stand…

This is a story of a young boy and his quest to become rich.
description.hu:
Ez a Jojo's Bizarre Adventure kilencedik történetíve.

O'ahu, napjainkban. Dua Lipa a trendi előadó és a COVID még mindig a fő gond. Ezen a szigeten él egy 15 éves srác, Jodio Joestar. Bátyával és édesanyjával él, dílerként dolgozik és bizonyos illegális anyagokat árul. Egy nap, a főnöke mutat neki egy kiválló fogást: egy japán személy Hawaiira érkezett egy hat millió dollárt érő gyémánttal. Normális esetben lehetetlen lenne ellopni, de akinek standje van...

Ez egy fiatal fiú és az ő küldetésének a története, hogy gazdag legyen.
description.it: O'ahu, oggi. Dua Lipa è la musicista di tendenza e il COVID è ancora una delle principali preoccupazioni. Su quest'isola vive un ragazzo di 15 anni di nome Jodio Joestar. Vive con il fratello e la madre e fa lo spacciatore di alcune sostanze illegali. Un giorno, il suo datore di lavoro arriva e gli mostra un'eccellente scoperta: un giapponese è sbarcato alle Hawaii con un diamante del valore di oltre sei milioni di dollari. Normalmente sarebbe impossibile da rubare, ma per qualcuno con una posizione... Questa è la storia di un ragazzo e della sua ricerca della ricchezza.
description.uk:
Дев’ята сюжетна арка «Неймовірних пригод Джоджо». Оаху, теперішній час. Дуа Ліпа – популярна музикантка, а COVID-19 досі викликає серйозне занепокоєння. На цьому острові мешкає 15-річний хлопчик на ім'я Джодіо Джостар. Живе з братом і матір'ю, торгує певними забороненими речовинами. Одного разу його бос прийшов до нього і показав неймовірну знахідку: японець висадився на Гаваях з діамантом вартістю понад шість мільйонів доларів! Зазвичай, вкрасти таку коштовність було б неможливо, але для того, хто має стенд… 
Це історія про молодого хлопця та його прагнення розбагатіти.
description.es-la: Cierto japonés ingresó a la isla de Hawái con un diamante de valor de 6 millones de dólares. En la isla de Oahu vive un chico llamado Jodio Joestar, cuya meta es arrebatar el diamante de las manos de esa persona. Junto a sus asociados, irán a la quinta de esa persona. Sin embargo, ¿Qué misterios les esperan?

altTitles.ja: カム トゥ ハンド

description.en: Overworked schoolteacher, Miharu, collapses onto the icy roads. Along comes local tattoo artist, Arashi to save the day. However, it being Miharu's first time seeing so many tattoo's up close, he unintentionally makes some insensitive comments. To apologize, Miharu goes to his shop to apologize, where he realizes just how kind Arashi is. He feels comfortable chatting to someone of the same age, but also feels like something doesn't seem right…

altTitles.ja: WxY ダブリューエックスワイ

description.en: For the entirety of his life, Yokoda Takashi has been drawing erotic drawings and it has been his way of expressing his sexuality. And now, he has managed to become a successful erotic comedy manga author for a monthly magazine. His series stars a character named Aimi who is actually based loosely on his niece with the same name. He keeps his job a secret, especially from his family from the fear that using Aimi's name in such a perverted way would cause hatred from everyone. But his manga's popularity rises and gets moved to a weekly magazine where there are vastly more readers and it seems like only a matter of time until the truth comes out. Takashi has to struggle between protecting his secret while keeping up with the production and erotic creativeness that comes with a weekly magazine series.

Mary, a girl who moved from Tokyo to the countryside, meets the mysterious girl Colin in a "secret garden" up in the mountains. With nowhere to go, they share a "secret" in the garden that they can't tell anyone. They didn't realize the consequences of what they did.......

(Source: Yuri-Hime, translated)
After rampant bullying, high school boy Takeshi Hirota kills himself and is transported to another another world, where he is accepted by the orcs due to his appearance.

description.en: Zagan is feared as an evil mage, he is awkward and has a sharp tongue, and once again had to put down thieves that encroached on his territory when he was researching that morning. In a dark auction, he finds a white slave elf, Nephie, who holds a peerless beauty. Falling in love with her at first sight, he uses his fortune to buy her, but as poor as he is socially, he doesn’t understand how to connect with her. Thus, the clumsy cohabitation of the mage that can’t convey his love, and the slave that pines for her master but doesn’t understand how to bring it up, begins.
description.es: Zagan es temido como un mago malvado, es torpe y tiene una lengua afilada, y una vez más tuvo que acabar con unos ladrones que invadieron su territorio cuando estaba investigando esa mañana. En una oscura subasta, encuentra a una esclava elfa blanca, Nephie, que posee una belleza sin igual. Enamorado de ella a primera vista, utiliza su fortuna para comprarla, pero tan pobre como es socialmente, no entiende cómo relacionarse con ella. Así comienza la torpe convivencia del mago que no sabe transmitir su amor y la esclava que suspira por su amo pero no sabe cómo planteárselo.
description.fr:
Zagan est craint comme mage démoniaque, un jour au marché noir il rencontre une esclave elfe du nom de Nephie. De part sa beauté innocente, il tombe sous son charme et décide de l'acheter. Bien que fortuné d'argent, ses compétences sociales ne le sont pas et il a du mal à savoir comment créer une relation…  
  
C'est parti pour une cohabitation maladroite entre ce maître qui ne sait montrer son amour et cette esclave qui en pince pour lui sans savoir quoi faire.
description.pt: Zagan é temido como um mago do mal, ele é desajeitado e tem uma língua afiada, e mais uma vez teve que acabar com ladrões que invadiram seu território quando ele estava pesquisando naquela manhã. Em um leilão clandestino, ele encontra uma elfa branco, Nephie, que possui uma beleza incomparável e estava sendo vendida como uma escrava. Apaixonando-se por ela à primeira vista, ele usa sua fortuna para comprá-la, mas sendo horrível socialmente, ele não entende como se conectar com ela. Assim, a desajeitada coabitação do mago que não pode transmitir seu amor, e a escrava que anseia por seu mestre, mas não sabe como agira, começa.

description.en: Front-line stories of the Defense Force not covered in the main series!

Usagi and Maho are good friends.

They walk around Kichijoji, visit Akabane, do riddles in the bookstore district, play doctor in the park, and so on.

Cute things happen anytime, anywhere in this strange town!

A whimsical, whimsical, fluffy and fun location comic~!
description.ja: うさぎとまほ、ふたりの女の子が可愛らしくデフォルメされた「街」を舞台に、好きなことを好きなように！　気ままで気まぐれでふわふわ楽しいロケーションコミック♪

description.en: In the distant past, the prosperous nation of Karma waged war against the nation of Spectra, resulting in the creation of an AI that wiped out all humans. Centuries later, Raye, the last surviving human, lives amongst an android society on the outskirts of Karma. On the night of her 13th birthday, her peaceful life is upended when Spectra attacks, destroying her home and forcing her friends to the front lines. Desperate to save everything she loves, Raye calls upon humanity's last bastion: "Sky Striker", the Karma-developed secret technology made to turn humans into the ultimate living weapons.… Unexpected, right? In this newest adaptation of Yu-Gi-Oh, the focus of the plot is not on the card game, but instead the many storylines featured in the cards. The first arc surrounds the Sky Striker series, with more to come in the future.
description.pt-br:
No passado distante, a próspera nação de Kama travou uma guerra contra a nação de Spectra, resultando na criação de uma IA que eliminou todos os humanos. Séculos depois, Raye, a última humana sobrevivente, vive entre uma sociedade de andróides nos arredores de Kama. Na noite de seu aniversário de 13 anos, sua vida pacífica é interrompida quando Spectra ataca, destruindo sua casa e forçando seus amigos a irem para a linha de frente. Desesperada para salvar tudo o que ama, Raye invoca o último bastião da humanidade: "Força Celeste", a tecnologia secreta desenvolvida por Kama feita para transformar humanos em armas vivas definitivas.

... Inesperado, certo? Nesta mais nova adaptação de Yu-Gi-Oh, o foco do enredo não está no jogo de cartas, mas sim nas muitas histórias apresentadas nas cartas. O primeiro arco envolve a série Força Celeste, com mais por vir no futuro.

altTitles.es-la: La dama de las primeras veces

description.en: Ojou Kotone is a first-year high school girl who was having trouble using the ticket machine at the station, Suguru Sewa, a first-year high school boy passing by helped her out, and he surprised as she transferred to Sewa's high school. It's her first time to taking the train, her first trying curry udon, Sewa being her first friend. This is a love comedy of firsts between a young lady and a caring high school boy!
description.ja: 御城琴音は超がつくお嬢様の高校１年生。駅の券売機の使い方が分からず困っているところを通りがかりの高校１年生・瀬和すぐるに助けられたのをきっかけに、瀬和の高校に転校してきた。はじめての電車。はじめてのカレーうどん。はじめての友達。「はじめてを教えて欲しい」お嬢様と世話焼き男子高校生のはじめてラブコメディ！
description.es-la: Ojou Kotone es una chica de primero de bachillerato que tenía problemas para usar la máquina expendedora de billetes de la estación, Suguru Sewa, un chico de primero de bachillerato que pasaba por allí la ayudó, y él se sorprendió ya que ella se cambió al instituto de Sewa. Es la primera vez que coge el tren, la primera vez que prueba el curry udon, y Sewa es su primer amigo. Se trata de una comedia de amor entre una joven y un cariñoso chico de instituto.

description.en: Nagi Seishiro is a second-year high school student. He is a boy whose habit is to say, "It's a pain in the ass," and he lives his life listlessly. Until his partner, Mikage Reo, discovers his talent in the "Blue Lock," a dormitory for training strikers that aims to win the World Cup for Japanese soccer.
description.fr: Nagi Seishiro est un lycéen de deuxième année. C'est un adolescent qui a l'habitude de tout le temps dire : « C'est chiant », il vit sa vie avec apathie. Jusqu'à ce que son camarade de classe, Mikage Reo, découvre son talent pour le foot, cela les mènera jusqu'au « Blue Lock », un centre de formation révolutionnaire rassemblant les 300 meilleurs attaquants lycéens du pays.
description.pt-br: Nagi Seishiro é um estudante do segundo ano do ensino médio. Ele é um garoto cujo hábito é dizer: "Que saco", e ele vive sua vida com indiferença. Até que seu parceiro, Mikage Reo, descobre seu talento em "Blue Lock", um dormitório para treinamento de atacantes que visa vencer a Copa do Mundo em nome do futebol japonês.

altTitles.th: พี่ชายสายบอดี้การ์ด

description.de:
Im Alter von acht Jahren verlor Ijin Yoo seine Eltern bei einem Flugzeugabsturz und strandete in einem fremden Land, wo er gezwungen war, ein Kindersöldner zu werden, um zu überleben. Zehn Jahre später kehrt er nach Hause zurück, um mit seiner Familie in Korea wieder vereint zu sein. Dort scheint alles friedlich zu sein, doch schon bald muss Ijin feststellen, dass das Leben als Teenager eine ganz andere Art des Überlebens ist. Da ihm nur noch ein Jahr in der Oberschule bleibt, muss Ijin neue Taktiken erlernen, um sich auf dem Schlachtfeld der Schule zurechtzufinden. Kann er ein Jahr Oberschule überleben? Oder wird die Schule vielmehr in der Lage sein, IHN zu überleben?

---
Die Geschichte handelt von einem jungen Koreaner, der bei einem Flugzeugabsturz seine Eltern verloren hat. Das Kind landet irgendwie in einem vom Krieg zerrissenen Teil der Welt und wird zu einem Top-Söldner im Teenageralter. Irgendwie findet er seine Familie wieder und beschließen, ein ruhiges Leben mit seiner Familie zu führen.

---

description.en:
At the age of eight, Ijin Yu lost his parents in a plane crash and became stranded in a foreign land, forced to become a child mercenary in order to stay alive. He returns home ten years later to be reunited with his family in Korea, where food and shelter are plenty and everything seems peaceful. But Ijin will soon learn that life as a teenager is a whole other feat of survival. With only one year of high school left, Ijin must master new tactics to maneuver his way around the schoolhouse battleground.

Can he survive a year of high school? Or rather, will the school be able to survive him?
description.es:
A los ocho años, Ijin Yu perdió a sus padres en un accidente aéreo y quedó varado en un país extranjero, forzado a convertirse en mercenario para sobrevivir. Diez años después, regresa a su hogar para reunirse con su familia en Corea, en donde sobra la comida y todo parece estar en paz. Sin embargo, Ijin pronto descubrirá que la vida de adolescente es otro tipo de supervivencia. En su último año de secundaria, Ijin debe dominar nuevas tácticas para resistir en el campo de batalla escolar. ¿Podrá sobrevivir a su último año? ¿O podrá su escuela sobrevivir a él?

---

description.en:
A slum where criminals' descendants live... People beyond the border look down and discriminate them as "tribal people." Ludo, an orphan boy, lives in the slum with his foster parent, Legt, and makes a living using his extraordinary physical abilities. However, one day, he was accused for a crime he didn't commit., and is thrown into the "abyss" which even the slum people fear.

---
Living in the slums of a wealthy town, Rudo and his foster father Legto try to coexist with the rest of the town's residents, but Rudo despises the wastefulness of the upper class. Ignoring the warnings from those around him, Rudo regularly rummages through the town's garbage in search of anything useful or valuable to save from the "Abyss"—a massive hole where anything considered trash is dumped, including people. Rudo's biological father was one such person, having been thrown into the Abyss after he was accused of murder.

One day, after running into a mysterious figure on the way home, Rudo returns to find Legto's dying body on the floor. He is immediately found at the scene by the authorities and is charged with murder. No one believes his claims of innocence, and he is thrown into the Abyss. Instead of dying, however, he finds himself in a strange, foul-smelling place surrounded by monsters made out of trash.

When Rudo is attacked by said monsters, he is saved by a man named Engine, who reveals himself to be a "janitor"—someone who uses special weapons called "jinkis" to combat these creatures. In order to get his revenge on the one who killed Legto, Rudo reluctantly becomes a janitor to fight his way back up and out of the Abyss.

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10010/episode/325146) (U.S. Only)
description.fa:
در اطـــــــراف حلبی‌آباد  پرتـگاهی وجـو د دارد که هرکـس مرتکب

مجازات محکوم می‌کنند.
description.id:
Di daerah kumuh dimana keturunan kriminal tinggal... orang-orang yang di luar perbatasan mendiskriminasi dan merendahkan mereka sebagai "orang suku.". rudo, anak yatim, yang tinggal di daerah kumuh dengan orang tua angkatnya, regto, dan bertahan hidup menggunakan kemampuan fisik hebatnya. bagaimanapun, suatu hari, dia dituduh melakukan kejahatan yang dia tidak lakukan, dan dilempar ke dalam "abyss" yang bahkan orang-orang di daerah kumu bahkan ditakuti.'
Tinggal di daerah kumuh dari kota makmur, Rudo dan ayah angkatnya regto mencoba untuk bersahabat dengan orang-orang kota, tapi rudo membenci borosnya orang kelas atas. mengabaikan peringatan dari sekitarnya, Rudo mengais sampah melalui tempat pembuangan kota untuk mencari barang-barang bernilai atau berguna untuk diselamatkan dari "abyss"- lubang besar dimana apapun yang dianggap sampah dibuang ke sana, termasuk manusia. Ayah kandung Rudo termasuk orang itu, yang dilempar ke dalalm Abys setelah dia difitnah melakukan pembunuhan.
Suatu hari, setelah lari dari sesosok misterius saat jalan pulang, Rudo menemukan tubuh sekarat Regto terbaring di lantai. dia dengan segera ditemukan di tkp oleh petugas dan dijatuhi dengan pembunuhan. Tidak seorangpun percaya ketidak bersalahannya, dan dia dilempar ke Abyss. Alih-alih mati, dia menemukan dirinya di tempat aneh, dan berbau busuk yang dikelilingi oleh monster yang terbuat dari sampah.
Ketika rudo diserang oleh monster itu, dia diselamatkan oleh pria yang bernama enjin, yang menyebut dirinya sebagai "janitor"- seseorang yang menggunakan senjata spesial yang disebut "jinki" untuk melawan makhluk itu. Agar dapat balas dendam pada orang yang membunuh Regto, Rudo dengan enggan menjadi seorang janitor untuk dapat kembali ke atas dan keluar dari Abyss.
description.ja: 犯罪者の子孫たちが暮らすスラム街。境界線の向こうの人々からは「族民」とさげすまれ、差別を受けていた。孤児だった少年・ルドは、育ての親であるレグトと共にスラム街に住み、常人離れした身体能力を武器に生計を立てていた。だがある日、身に覚えのない罪を着せられ、スラムの人々でさえ恐れる「奈落」へと落とされてしまう……。
description.es-la:
Barrios marginales habitados por descendientes de delincuentes. La gente de fuera de la frontera los desprecia y discrimina como "gente de la tribu". Ludo, un niño huérfano, vive en el barrio bajo con su padre adoptivo Legto, y se gana la vida utilizando sus extraordinarias habilidades físicas. Sin embargo, un día es acusado de un crimen que no cometió y se ve abocado al "abismo" que hasta los habitantes de los barrios bajos temen.

(Source: Pocket Magazine)
description.pt-br: O grito redundante da alma que vem do fundo do poço em direção ao mundo infestado pelo desprezo e segregação! O subúrbio onde vivem os descendentes dos criminosos. Mesmo assim o Ludo vivia em meio à esse ambiente, de cabeça erguida, mas......!?

title.en: Otonari no Tenshi-sama ni Itsu no Ma ni ka Dame Ningen ni Sareteita Ken

altTitles.ja: お隣の天使様にいつの間にか駄目人間にされていた件

altTitles.en: The Angel Next Door Spoils Me Rotten

altTitles.pt-br: Meu Anjo de Vizinha Me Mima Demais

description.en: Mahiru is a beautiful girl whose classmates all call her an “angel.” Not only is she a star athlete with perfect grades—she’s also drop-dead gorgeous. Amane‚ an average guy and self-admitted slob‚ has never thought much of the divine beauty‚ despite attending the same school. Everything changes‚ however‚ when he happens to see Mahiru sitting alone in a park during a rainstorm. Thus begins the strange relationship between this incredibly unlikely pair!
description.ja: 高校生の藤宮周が住むマンションの隣には、「天使様」と呼ばれる学校で一番の美少女・椎名真昼が住んでいる。特に関わり合いのなかった二人だが、雨の中ずぶ濡れになっていた彼女に傘を貸したことから、不思議な交流が始まった。自堕落な一人暮らしを送る周を見かねて、なにかと世話を焼く真昼。お互いに興味ないと言い合う二人は、それでも少しずつ距離を縮めていく……。
description.vi: Fujimiya Amane sống một mình trong căn hộ của mình, và cô gái xinh nhất ở trường cậu, Shiina Mahiru, lại là hàng xóm của cậu. Họ hầu như chẳng bao giờ nói chuyện với nhau cho tới một ngày trời mưa cậu thấy cô không cầm theo ô và cho cô mượn. Để cảm ơn thì cô đã thường xuyên giúp anh làm việc nhà, từ đó mối quan hệ của họ bắt đầu nảy nở.
description.pt-br:
Fujimiya Amane, um estudante do ensino médio, mora sozinho em seu apartamento. Ao lado dele mora Shiina Mahiru, a garota mais bonita da escola. Alguém que todos chamam de "anjo". Eles nunca conversam de verdade, mas quando Amane empresta seu guarda-chuva a Mahiru em um dia chuvoso, o relacionamento deles começa a florescer.

Em pouco tempo Mahiru descobre que Amane negligencia sua cozinha e limpeza, e ela se sente obrigada a intervir.

Embora eles não tenham nenhum interesse um pelo outro, eles lentamente se aproximam...

Esta é a história de amor agridoce de um jovem e sua bela vizinha de língua afiada.

title.en: Infinite Job Transfer: I Can Summon Max Level Goddess

description.en: Yun Xinghe, who encountered a bizarre car accident, opened his eyes and found himself in a dangerous world. What's worse, a beautiful fairy did a series of shameful things to him and said she would be responsible for him. Hey... what are you talking about! ? I'm a gentleman... Wait, what's the point of unlimited job transfer? Where's the beauty around me? ! ! !

The manga follows gladiators competing for the top in the colosseum, including one who used to be an online streamer.

(Source: ANN)

altTitles.fr: Host Club - Le Lycée de la séduction

description.en: One day, Haruhi, a scholarship student at exclusive Ouran High School, breaks an $80,000 vase that belongs to the "Host Club," a mysterious campus group consisting of six super-rich (and gorgeous) guys. To pay back the damages, she is forced to work for the club, and it's there that she discovers just how wealthy the boys are and how different they are from everybody else. [Viz]

altTitles.th: อาถรรพ์ป่าต้องสาป

description.en:
After the sudden death of her parents, a young woman named Shiori Kanzaki find a picture of a man that she believes to be her grandfather, and travels to Azaka Village, where he was apparently from, in hopes of meeting him. However, when she arrives she instead finds that the tiny village has a museum that she realizes she lived in as a young girl. There she meets Sakuma, a middle school girl who tends to get herself in trouble, and Suga, the strange manager of the museum who only communicates in written memos. Suga grudgingly allows her to stay at the museum for awhile and research her family. But there is a legend in the village of "Kotori Obake", a demon woman who abducts children who go into the nearby forest. How is this story connected to Shiori's past, and why does she hear voices calling her, commanding her to "Come fulfill the promise"?   
  
Adapted from the game of the same name.
description.pt: Depois da morte repentina de seus pais, uma jovem garota chamada Shiori Kanzaki encontrou uma foto de um homem que acredita ser o seu avô, e viaja até a vila Azakawa, que era, aparentemente, sua terra natal, na esperança de o encontrar. Entretanto, quando chega, ao invés, ela descobre que a pequena vila tem um prédio de arquivos e percebe que viveu lá quando era mais nova. Ali, ela conhece Sakuma, uma garota da escola secundária que tende a se meter em prolemas, e Suga, o estranho dono do prédio que só se comunica via notas. Suga permite que ela fique no prédio por um tempo e pesquise sobre sua família. Mas tem uma lenda na vila sobre a "Kotoriobake", uma mulher demónio que abduz as crianças que chegam perto da floresta. Como essa história está conectada com o passado de Shiori e porque ela escuta vozes a chamado, dizendo que "venha cumprir a promessa"?
description.pt-br: Após a morte súbita de seus pais, uma jovem chamada Shiori Kanzaki encontra uma foto de um homem que ela acredita ser seu avô, e viaja para a aldeia Azakawa, de onde ele aparentemente era, na esperança de conhecê-lo. No entanto, quando chega, ela descobre que a pequena aldeia tem um museu que ela percebe que viveu lá quando era mais jovem. Lá ela conhece Sakuma, uma garota do ensino médio que tende a se meter em problemas, e Suga, o estranho gerente do museu que só se comunica em memorandos escritos. Suga relutantemente permite que ela fique no museu por algum tempo e pesquise sua família. Mas há uma lenda na aldeia de "Kotori Obake", uma mulher demônio que sequestra crianças que entram na floresta próxima. Como essa história está ligada ao passado de Shiori e por que ela ouve vozes chamando-a, ordenando-lhe que "Venha cumprir a promessa?"

description.en: On the day that Kendo Champion Shiho decided to help out his single mother run a Gukbap restaurant, he received news that his sister, Shiyeon, committed suicide. During the funeral, Shiho realizes that something was wrong. It wasn't a suicide, she was murdered. In order to learn the truth and get revenge for his sister's death, Shiho lifts up his sword once more to begin a war of his own.
description.fr: Le jour où Shiho, champion de kendo décide d’aider sa mère célibataire à tenir un restaurant de gukbap, il apprend que sa sœur, Shiyeon, s’est suicidée. Pendant les funérailles, Shiho se rend compte que quelque chose cloche. Ce n’était pas un suicide, elle a été assassinée. Pour découvrir la vérité et venger la mort de sa sœur, Shiho reprend son sabre et entame sa propre guerre.
description.ru:
В день, когда мастер кендо Шихо решает всё бросить и помочь своей матери-одиночке в управлении небольшим ресторанчиком, он узнаёт о том, что его младшая сестра Шиён, которая училась в университете Сеула, покончила с собой. 
Во время похорон Шихо замечает кое-что странное. 
Чтобы узнать правду и отомстить за смерть сестры, Шихо снова берёт в руки уже знакомый меч и начинает свою собственную войну.

title.en: The Youngest Daughter of the Villainous Duke

altTitles.en: She Is the Youngest Daughter of the Villainous Duke
The Real Youngest Daughter of the Villainous Duke

altTitles.ja: 過保護な悪党公爵家で奮闘中です!

altTitles.zh: 反派家族的掌权小女儿

description.en:
I possessed a character in a novel I had never finished writing when I was in high school. And then now I have the body of a supporting character instead of the main character. It was a seven-year-old orphan girl with no name… Having to suffer the abuse of others, until I got really tired and ran away from that place. But I was captured and sold as a slave. I thought my life was over… But the person who saved me was the novel's most prominent villain, Henriette.

He treats the emperor like a puppet. A person who has a reputation for being extremely cruel in the original and has a hobby of cutting the throat of aristocrats. …Is he my biological father? But other than that terrible reputation, living with him wasn’t bad either.

"Okay, my daughter. You can do whatever you want. If you want something, everyone in the family will do what you want."

Wait… I didn't write a novel like that in the first place?

---

description.id:
Ketika saya masih seorang siswa sekolah menengah, saya sangat terpesona oleh novel itu sehingga saya berhenti menulis. Dan sekarang saya merasuki tubuh karakter pendukung, bukan karakter utama. Itu adalah gadis yatim piatu berusia 7 tahun tanpa nama... Harus menderita melemahkan orang lain, sampai saya benar-benar lelah dan lari dari tempat itu. Tapi saya ditangkap dan dijual sebagai budak. Saya pikir hidup saya sudah berakhir ...Tetapi orang yang menyelamatkan saya adalah penjahat paling menonjol dalam novel, Henriette. Dia memperlakukan kaisar seperti boneka. Seseorang yang memiliki reputasi sangat kejam dalam aslinya dan memiliki hobi memotong tenggorokan bangsawan. …Apakah itu ayah biologisku? Tapi selain reputasi buruk itu, tinggal bersamanya juga tidak buruk. “Baiklah, sayangku” “Kamu bisa melakukan apapun yang kamu mau. Jika Anda menginginkan sesuatu, semua orang di keluarga akan melakukan apa yang Anda inginkan.” Tunggu… Aku tidak menulis novel seperti itu sejak awal?

* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/131595)
description.pt-br:
Eu possuía um personagem em um romance que parei de escrever por hobby quando estava no ensino médio. Minha mãe morreu em um acidente, e dizem que meu pai morreu logo depois de ir para a cadeia. Graças a isso, fiquei órfã aos sete anos sem nome. Enquanto morava na casa de outra pessoa, estava exausto de trabalhar e fui pego fugindo. Em seguida, vendido para s * salvar comerciantes. Eu queria saber se esta vida foi feita para ser arruinada. O respeitável Duque, o maior vilão do Império, comprou-me. "Ela tem 7 anos, mas era pequena e muito magra." Henriette, a pior vilã do original, cujo hobby é fazer todo mundo agir como uma marionete, pregar peças na família imperial e ameaçar o pescoço da aristocracia, descobriu-se que aquele homem assustador é meu verdadeiro pai que foi preso! Mas você parece um pouco diferente do vilão original. "Bem, duque..." "Não." “…Oh, pai?” "Isso também." "...uh, papai?" “Sim, minha filha. O que você quer ter hoje? Henriette, que eu achava assustadora, é mais amigável do que eu pensava. “Se alguém te incomodar de agora em diante, você tem que contar pro seu irmão mais velho, ok? Vou afogá-los no fundo do lago.” “Devo ver flores com minha irmãzinha hoje? Há tantas sereias ornamentais na estufa de vidro. Achei que você iria gostar, então peguei eu mesmo. Fiz um bom trabalho? “Essa garota lenta! Papai te ligou... Não eu não sou doido! Droga, não seja idiota! Ahhh! Sim! Estou errado! OK?" Os novos irmãos eram definitivamente vilões no original, mas são muito mais legais do que eu pensava. "Tu podes fazer o que quiseres. Qualquer pessoa da família, se você disser, ouvirá com atenção e fará o que você disser”. Mas é estranho. O romance que escrevi não era originalmente assim. “…Se você me prometer algumas coisas, eu ficarei com você de novo. Eu não vou deixar você. “Você pode me ver a qualquer hora sem hora marcada.” "Eu devo? Eu sempre posso fugir para um lugar onde você nunca mais me encontrará. Ele franziu as sobrancelhas. Se eu soubesse que uma pequena palavra de expressão teria causado uma reação tão terrível, eu teria ficado de boca fechada. Foi quando eu estava no meio do arrependimento, "Você está enganado. Você acha que eu vou deixar você ir em primeiro lugar, isso não deveria ser possível primeiro? "…That?" "Quem disse que eu deixaria você fugir?" …Não importa o quanto eu pense sobre isso, acho que entendi errado. "Se você realmente fugir, você não deve ser pego por mim novamente."

---

description.en:
You can’t win through only with “friendship” and “youth”. We stake our lives to get to Koshien!!  
  
Kanou Shoutarou entered an official baseball club at one of the best powerhouse baseball schools in the country - DL Gakuen. However the discipline in the club, he admired so much, was beyond all imagination!  
  
From Nakibokuro - the former member of PL Gakuen’s baseball club who played at the Koshien as the regular!

altTitles.ja: サキュバスがやってきたお話

altTitles.en: The Story of a Succubus Who Came to the Human World

description.en: The story of a Succubus who comes to the human world to absorb life force energy. Accidentally, she lives as a child in a strange man's house.

_The secret between me and her is trivial yet important._

Hajime Takahashi, enrolled in Shuubi High School solely because it's the sacred place of his favorite manga. Everywhere in the school are locations that appeared in the manga, and he's super excited! Amidst this excitement, Takahashi meets a beautiful girl, Yayoi Kurokawa, who looks just like the heroine from his favorite work, and they come to share a certain secret. 

This awkward duo weaves a sweet and tangy youth romantic comedy that will make you grin!
description.ja: 僕と彼女の秘密は、些細だけど大切で。大好きな漫画の聖地、それだけが理由で秀美高校に入学した主人公・高橋一。学内はどこに行っても作品に出てきた聖地だらけで大興奮！そんな中、高橋は大好きな作品のヒロインそっくりな美少女・黒川弥生と出会い、とある秘密を共有することに――。不器用な2人が織りなす甘酸っぱくて、ニヤニヤしちゃう青春ラブコメ‼

title.en: Misato-san wa Amasugi Joushi ni Chotto Kibishii

altTitles.ja: 三郷さんは甘すぎ上司にちょっとキビしい

altTitles.en: Misato-san is a Bit Cold Towards Her Boss Who Pampers

altTitles.vi: Misato có hơi lạnh lùng với người sếp của cô ấy

description.en:
Misato-san, a very beautiful office lady who is good at her job, and her boss—Konishikawa-san, a middle-aged man who spoils his subordinates. Misato-san has a strict attitude toward Konishikawa-san, but what are the hidden feelings behind it?! The gap between the seriousness and cuteness will make you faint in anxiety, and this office love comedy with a difference in age begins! (MTL)

---

**Links:** 
- [Alternative Raw](https://shukanmanga.jp/work_list/detail/misatosan)
description.ja: 仕事ができて超美人OLの三郷さんと、部下に甘いおじさん上司の小西川さん。三郷さんは小西川さんに対して厳しい態度で接するが、そこに隠された想いとは…！？ 厳しさと可愛さのギャップに悶絶する、年の差オフィスラブコメディー開幕！！

title.en: Bocchi the Rock! - Boniji the Rock! (Doujinshi)

altTitles.ja: シリアルキラー異世界に降り立つ

altTitles.en: The Serial Killer Descends Into Another World
The serial killer is reincarnated into the another world.

altTitles.es-la: Un asesino serial ha descendido a otro mundo

altTitles.de: Serienkiller in einer anderen Welt reinkarniert

description.de:
Ein Mörder, der den Drang, Menschen zu töten, nicht stoppen kann, obwohl er damit aufhören will, erhält das von ihm gewünschte Todesurteil.
Seine Freude ist nur von kurzer Dauer, denn er wird in einer anderen Welt reinkarniert. Der Auftrag, den ihm die Göttin erteilt hat, besteht darin, 12 reinkarnierte Menschen mit seinen mörderischen Impulsen zu töten.
Nicht alle reinkarnierten Menschen sind Heilige!
description.en:
A murderer who cannot stop the urge to kill people, even though he wants to stop, receives the death sentence he wants.
His joy is short-lived, as he is reincarnated in another world. The mission entrusted to him by the goddess is to kill 12 reincarnated people using his murderous impulses.
Not all reincarnated people are saints!

title.en: Kikanshita S-Kyuu Boukensha no Quest Seikatsu

altTitles.ja: 帰還したS級冒険者のクエスト生活

altTitles.ja-ro: Kikan Shita S-Kyuu Boukensha no Quest Seikatsu

altTitles.en: The Regressed S-Class Adventurer's Quest Life

description.en:
Dungeons began to suddenly appear throughout the world
Kyomi Aki became an S-Class adventurer assassin with his tremendous speed.
Unfortunately, assassins were considered as a failure class.
His class was becoming harder and harder to master the more he advanced.
The class itself had a low attack power and mana, so he needed to always rely on someone else.
One day, Aki encountered a dangerous monster that could wipe out the entirety of humanity.
He somewhat managed to subjugate the monster, but lost his life in the process.
Suddenly, he awoke and found himself having regressed 20 years into the past.
He also received an additional “Bonus Quest” as a reward for solo killing the monster.
With his knowledge from his previous lifetime and this “quest,” Aki resolved himself to redo everything to become the strongest adventurer.

title.en: Totsugi Okureta Kitsune ga Yome ni Kuru Hanashi

altTitles.ja: 嫁ぎ遅れた狐が嫁に来る話

altTitles.en: The Story of the Fox Who Was Late Getting Married and Came to be My Bride

description.en: One day, overworked salaryman Goro is taking a walk on the mountain behind his house and comes across a fox lying upside down on the side of the road... The fox yells 'Hey you! Got a moment?'  And well, if you've seen the title you know the rest.  This is a cute and fluffy romcom about a fox's wedding(?).
description.ja:
狐を拾ったら、嫁がれました。

三十路手前のサラリーマン、日野峰吾郎は、とある理由で嫁ぎ遅れた化け狐、こがねを助けたことで恩返しと称した求婚を迫られる。こがねを無下にすることもできず、吾郎は「1年間の同棲を経て妻として認められたら結婚する」という条件を提案することに。果たしてこがねは無事に嫁ぐことができるのか？

description.en: A god created AOTU World and established the 7 Oracles to rule it on behalf of this god. The poor and rich, enslaved and free, suffering and happiness, destruction and birth: every status is ordained by God. Mortals can only accept, but cannot resist. However, God has given his people the opportunity to change their fate through "AOTU Contest." The contestants use their unique "ability" gifted by the Contest System and inbate wisdom and courage in hopes of winning the competition and becoming the world's ruler.
description.vi:
Thần Sáng Thế của thế giới Ao Đột là một vị thần rất ngẫu hứng.
Ngài tạo ra vô số hành tinh và con dân trong thế giới Ao Đột, nhưng lại cai quản họ một cách tùy ý không theo quy luật --- có hành tinh màu mỡ tươi đẹp, có hành tinh cằn cỗi hoang vu, có con dân được hưởng tự do hạnh phúc, có con dân lại phải chịu sưu thuế nặng nề và lao động khổ sai.
Thần Sáng Thế thành lập ra Bảy Thần Sử, để họ thay mình thực hiện ý chỉ của thần
Thế nhưng cũng không phải là Thần Sáng Thế hoàn toàn không cho con dân mình cơ hội --- nếu như ai muốn thay đổi vận mệnh, thực hiện nguyện vọng của bản thân, vậy thì hãy tham gia "Đại chiến Ao Đột" đi! Các thí sinh sẽ được hệ thống đại chiến ban cho "năng lực đặc biệt", rèn luyện và vận dụng năng lực của riêng mình, không ngừng chiến đấu vượt qua thử thách. Chỉ cần là người chiến thắng sau cùng trong đại chiến Ao Đột là có thể đạt được tất cả, đồng thời được ban cho quyền thay mặt thần cai trị thế giới giống như Bảy Thần Sử.
Tuy nhiên, những điều trên chỉ là quan niệm giả dối, cuộc đấu này đã định sẵn không hề có kẻ chiến thắng. Cho tới khi nhân vật chính của chúng ta - Kim, xuất hiện trên sân đấu.

description.en:
Hana was never first. Always because Han Geon Woo came in first every time!
Hana would do anything to best Geon Woo, even though she can't figure him out.
This time, she tried to shock him by confessing...
He believed and accepted the confession though? 
Does he like me?

altTitles.ja: 異剣戦記ヴェルンディオ

description.en:
On a desperate battlefield... I'll start running a tavern!

Cleo, a man who has been a mercenary for 10 years, meets a mysterious girl named Kohaku. In order to survive on the battlefield, where "different swords" with great power are flying around, the two of them start running a "tavern" where soldiers gather!
description.ja:
絶望の戦場で…酒場経営はじめます！

傭兵歴10年の男・クレオは
不思議な少女・コハクと出会う。
強大な力を持つ「異剣」が飛び交う
戦場を生き延びるために、
二人が始めたのは――
兵士たちが集う「酒場」の経営！？
description.es-la:
En un campo de batalla desesperado... ¡Empieza a dirigir una taberna!

Cleo, un hombre con 10 años de experiencia como mercenario
Conoce a una misteriosa chica llamada Kohaku.
Para sobrevivir en el campo de batalla donde vuelan las poderosas "otras espadas".
Lo que los dos empiezan a hacer es... Dirigir una "taberna" donde se reúnen los soldados.

title.en: Kirby of the Stars: Pupupu Hero

altTitles.ja: 星のカービィ プププヒーロー

description.en:
Kirby, the gourmand who will suck up anything, has come to the peaceful land of Pupupu!
"Pleased to eat you! I'm Kirby!"

The slapstick and lively days are about to begin, involving Chilly, who has come to live with Kirby!

"I've been cheating on you. Oh, and it's not just one guy. It's three. Sorry about that."

Back in middle school, Akiyoshi Sunao's first-ever girlfriend shattered his heart, and he swore off love. However, all that changes when he develops a crush on a girl in his university's film club. Just as he's finally beginning to move on from the past, he bumps into his ex-girlfriend. Little does he know that this is only the beginning...

To his horror, he wakes up in her body the next morning!
description.ja: 「実は4股してるの　ごめんね」。中学時代、人生で初めての彼女にヒドイ振られ方をした秋吉直（あきよしすなお）。「もう誰かを好きになることなんてない」と思っていたが、大学生となり映画サークルの先輩・小河原菜摘（こがはらなつみ）に惹かれ始める。しかし、そんな折に元カノ・西川檸檬（にしかわれもん）と再会。しかも翌朝目が覚めると、身体が入れ替わっていて…!?
description.es-la: "Te he estado engañando. Ah, y no es sólo un chico. Son tres. Lo siento". En la secundaria, la primera novia de Akiyoshi Sunao le destrozó el corazón y renunció al amor. Sin embargo, todo eso cambia cuando se enamora de una chica en el club de cine de su universidad. Justo cuando finalmente comienza a dejar atrás el pasado, se topa con su exnovia. Lo que no sabe es que esto es sólo el comienzo... ¡Para su horror, se despierta en su cuerpo a la mañana siguiente!
description.pt-br: "Eu tenho te traído. Ah, e não é apenas um cara. São três. Desculpe por isso." De volta ao ensino médio, o primeiro amor de Akiyoshi Sunao despedaçou seu coração, e ele jurou evitar o amor. No entanto, tudo muda quando ele se apaixona por uma garota no clube de cinema da universidade. Justo quando ele está começando a superar o passado, ele esbarra com sua ex-namorada. Mal sabe ele que isso é apenas o começo... Para seu horror, ele acorda no corpo dela na manhã seguinte!

altTitles.es: Nozaki y su revista mensual para chicas

altTitles.th: นักเขียนหน้าตายนายโนซากิคุง

description.ar: تدور أحداث القصة تشيو ساكورا هي طالبة في المدرسة الثانوية، معجبة بزميلها أوميتارو نوزاكي، عندما تعترف بحبها له، يظن أنها معجبة ويعطيها توقيعه عندما تقول له إنها تريد أن تكون معه، يدعوها إلى منزله ويساعدها في تعلم رسم. تكتشف ساكورا أن نوزاكي هو في الواقع فنان شوجو مانغا مشهور يعمل تحت الاسم المستعار ساكيكو يومينو، توافق على أن تكون مساعدته من أجل الاقتراب منه.
description.de:
Chiyo Sakura ist hoffnungslos in ihren Klassenkameraden Nozaki verliebt. Doch als sie ihm ihre Liebe gesteht, gibt Nozaki ihr ein Autogramm, lädt sie zu sich nach Hause ein… und drückt ihr einen Pinsel in die Hand.

Zu ihrer Überraschung entpuppt sich Sakuras Schwarm als berühmter Mangazeichner, der romantische Liebesgeschichten für Mädchen zeichnet! Um ihm näherzukommen, beginnt Sakura, als seine Assistentin zu arbeiten. Und eh sie sich versieht, steht ihr Alltag auf dem Kopf…
description.en:
The boy of her dreams… is a girl's manga artist? To the eyes of high school student Chiyo Sakura, classmate Umetarou Nozaki–brawny of build and brusque of tongue - is a dreamboat! When Chiyo finally works up the courage to tell Nozaki how she feels about him, she knows rejection is on the table… but getting recruited as a manga-ka's assistant?! Never in a million years!

But for someone who makes a living drawing sweet girly romances, Nozaki-kun is a little slow on the uptake when it comes to matters of the heart in reality. And so Chiyo's daily life of manga making and heartache begins!

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [MANGA UP!](https://global.manga-up.com/manga/125)
description.es:
Aquel estudiante de bachillerato un poco brusco era dibujante de manga shôjo romántico.

Umetarô Nozaki es un estudiante un poco brusco. Chiyo Sakura, que también estudia bachillerato, está enamorada de él y un día hace acopio de valor y se le declara. Sin embargo, por algún extraño motivo, en vez de convertirse en su chica, pasa a ser su asistente de manga shôjo. ¡Una comedia que narra el día a día de Nozaki, que, aunque es estudiante, también es un mangaka popular!
description.fr: La lycéenne Chiyo Sakura est tombée amoureuse d'Umetarou Nozaki, un grand jeune homme à l'air imperturbable, voire benêt. Lorsqu'elle lui confesse ses sentiments, il la prend pour une de ses fans et lui fait un autographe. Lorsqu'elle lui dit vouloir toujours être à ses côtés, il l'invite dans son appartement et lui donne du travail à faire. Chiyo découvre que Nozaki est en fait un mangaka renommé, qui écrit sous le pseudonyme Sakiko Yumeno. Elle accepte de devenir son assistante en espérant pouvoir se rapprocher de lui. En travaillant sur son shoujo manga *Let's Fall in Love*, Chiyo rencontre d'autres camarades qui apportent leur aide ou servent d'inspiration à Nozaki-kun pour ses personnages.
description.id:
A, aku mau menembak cowok yang kusuka. Tapi saat berhadapan dengannya, yang keluar malah lain.

Tapi akhirnya, yang kudapat darinya adalah sebuah tanda tangan!?
Lho, lhoo..ternyata dia komikus komik cewek!?
description.it: Il ragazzo dei suoi sogni... è un disegnatore di manga per ragazze? Agli occhi della studentessa Chiyo Sakura, il suo compagno di classe Nozaki –rissoso, muscoloso e dalla lingua tagliente- è un vero sogno! Quando decide di dichiarargli, finalmente, i suoi sentimenti si aspetta di essere respinta… ma finire a fare l'assistente di un mangaka? Ma neanche in un milione di anni! Ma per qualcuno che si guadagna da vivere scrivendo di batticuori e patemi d'amore, Nozaki è… un po' lento di comprendonio per quanto riguarda la realtà. E così la vita di Chiyo, tra manga e amore, ha finalmente inizio...
description.ja:
無骨な男子高校生は、乙女な少女漫画家でした。

無骨な男子高校生「野崎梅太郎」。彼に恋をした女子高生「佐倉千代」は勇気を振り絞って告白するものの、何故か恋人ではなく少女漫画家のアシスタントになったのでした…。男子高校生でありながら人気少女漫画家でもある野崎くんの日常を描く、少女漫画家男子コメディー!!
description.ko: 과묵하고 듬직한 남고생 노자키 군. 그런 노자키를 남몰래 짝사랑하던 사쿠라 치요는 용기내어 고백을 하지만 돌아오는 것은 노자키의 사인이었는데…?
description.pl:
Nieokrzesany licealista okazuje się być autorem niewinnych mang shojo!
Chiyo Sakura zbiera się na odwagę i postanawia wyznać miłość Umetarou Nozakiemu, nieoględnemu licealiście, ale zamiast zostać jego dziewczyną, dostaje angaż w charakterze asystentki i od tej chwili razem tworzą komiksy. Oto komedia opowiadająca o codziennym życiu Nozakiego, profesjonalnego mangaki specjalizującego się w shojo!
description.pt:
Sakura Chiyo confessa seu amor pelo Nozaki-kun, mas ele a confunde como uma fã! Incapaz de transmitir seus sentimentos, as coisas começam a ficar complicadas quando Nozaki-kun a convida para ir à sua casa, onde ela descobre que ele é um mangaká de mangá shoujo. Sakura então decide ser a assistente de Nozaki-kun, a fim de se aproximar dele. Agora, Sakura tem que transmitir os seus verdadeiros sentimentos enquanto a sua relação com Nozaki se desenvolve!  


---
description.ru: Сакура пытается признаться Нозаки, а он дает ей автограф. Странно? Вовсе нет, ведь потом он сразу приглашает её домой, где Сакуру ждет сюрприз! Забавная история о парне, который рисует сёдзё, хотя совсем не выглядит знатоком девичьих сердец, и девушке, что всеми силами старается донести до него свои чувства.
description.th: นักเรียนมัธยมปลายหญิงชื่อซากุระ จิโยะแอบชอบเพื่อนร่วมห้องชายชื่อโนซากิ อุเมะทาโร่ แต่เมื่อซากุระสารภาพรักกับโนซากิ โนซากิกลับเข้าใจผิดว่าซากุระเป็นแฟนคลับจึงมอบลายเซ็นให้ เมื่อซากุระบอกว่าตนอยากอยู่เคียงข้างโนซากิ โนซากิก็เชิญซากุระมาที่บ้านแล้วให้ซากุระช่วยเขียนการ์ตูน ซากุระจึงได้รู้ว่าจริง ๆ แล้วโนซากิเป็นนักเขียนการ์ตูนแนวโชโจะชื่อดังที่ใช้นามปากกว่าว่ายูเมโนะ ซากิโกะ ซากุระยอมรับการเป็นผู้ช่วยเขียนการ์ตูนเพื่อให้ใกล้ชิดโนซากิ ระหว่างที่ทั้งคู่ร่วมทำงานเขียนการ์ตูนเรื่อง จงรัก. ก็ได้พบกับเพื่อนร่วมโรงเรียนคนอื่น ๆ ที่มาร่วมช่วยเขียนการ์ตูน และ/หรือเป็นแรงบันดาลใจให้เรื่องราวในการ์ตูน
description.tr: Sakura Chiyo,aşık olduğu Nozaki-kun'a hislerini söylemeye çalışır. Ama sıradan bi lise öğrencisi gibi görünen aslında ünlü bir Mangaka olan Nozaki onu bir fan'ı sanır.
description.vi:
Nam sinh cấp ba khô khan lại là tác giả truyện tranh thiếu nữ lãng mạn!

Nozaki Umetaro là một nam sinh cấp ba khô khan. Cô bạn Sakura Chiyo thích cậu và đã dồn hết can đảm để tỏ tình. Nhưng không hiểu sao cô không trở thành người yêu, mà thành trợ lý bất đắc dĩ cho cậu tác giả truyện tranh thiếu nữ này. Kể từ đó, hàng loạt tình huống khó hiểu, thậm chí… khó đỡ liên tiếp xảy đến.

Đây là câu chuyện hài hước về cuộc sống thường ngày của Nozaki, một nam sinh cấp ba đồng thời cũng là tác giả truyện tranh thiếu nữ nổi tiếng.
description.zh:
粗犷的高中男生，其实是纯情的少女漫画家。

女高中生佐仓千代喜欢同班的粗线条男生野崎梅太郎。她鼓起勇气向野崎表白，不知何故没有成为对方的恋人，反而成为了少女漫画家的助手……

描绘拥有双重身份的野崎君，身兼男高中生及人气少女漫画家的日常生活。男子少女漫画家的喜剧开演！
description.zh-hk:
粗獷的男高中生「野崎梅太郎」。 
暗戀他的女高中生「佐倉千代」雖然鼓起勇氣告白，
但不僅求愛未果，還陰錯陽差成為少女漫畫家的助手……
描繪具有雙重身分的野崎同學，高中男生兼人氣少女漫畫家的日常生活。
少女漫畫家男子喜劇!!
